DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: I. Classify renal tubular defects using clinical and biochemical findings in patients with Fanconi syndrome and cystinosis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Fanconi Syndrome and Cystinosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Patients receive a clinical and biochemical evaluation, including a psychometric assessment and molecular, renal, and thyroid studies.
DOC.criteria: Inherited renal tubular defects, i.e., Fanconi syndrome Fanconi syndrome due to cystinosis eligible
